# Prisma Flowchart {-}

## Search strategy, database selection {-}


```{r}
caption <- '**PRISMA flowcharts for TMS studies.** PRISMA2020 flow diagram for published TMS trials in drug addiction from Jan 2000 to Jan 2023. Abbreviations: *n*, number of publications.'
```

```{r prisma-flowcharts-for-tms-studies, fig.cap=caption}
knitr::include_graphics(path = "fig/prisma-flowcharts-for-tms-studies.png")
```
